description: Located in a charming medieval hamlet dating back to the 13C, this authentic osteria serves home-style traditional, regional dishes – the chard and ricotta ravioli served with cheese and oil are particularly delicious. For an even more enjoyable experience, book one of the tables on the delightful summer terrace with fine views of the surrounding hills.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
